Title: Adaptive Intelligence Open Source .NET Framework
Description: This framework is the basis for all Adaptive Intelligence products and applications.  This project consists of three libraries: A base class and API library in Managed C++, a general use library in C#, and a Windows Forms Controls library in C#.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This framework is the basis for all Adaptive Intelligence products and applications. This project consists of three libraries: A base class and API library in Managed C++, a general use library in C#, and a Windows Forms Controls library in C#.

For more on Adaptive Intelligence, see our website at:
http://www.adaptiveintelligence.net
